description: Twilio is a cloud communications platform that enables developers to integrate messaging, voice, and video capabilities into their applications.
name: twilio
title: Twilio

properties.description: The recipient's phone number in E.164 format.
properties.name: To
properties.label: To

properties.description: The sender's Twilio phone number (in E.164 format), alphanumeric sender ID, Wireless SIM, short code, or channel address (e.g., whatsapp:+15554449999). The value of the from parameter must be a sender that is hosted within Twilio and belongs to the Account creating the Message. If you are using messaging_service_sid, this parameter can be empty (Twilio assigns a from value from the Messaging Service's Sender Pool) or you can provide a specific sender from your Sender Pool.
properties.name: From
properties.label: From

properties.description: The text content of the outgoing message. SMS only: If the body contains more than 160 GSM-7 characters (or 70 UCS-2 characters), the message is segmented and charged accordingly. For long body text, consider using the send_as_mms parameter.
properties.name: Body
properties.label: Body

properties.description: Use a template for the message body.
properties.name: useTemplate
properties.label: Use Template

properties.description: The SID of the content template to be used for the message body.
properties.name: ContentSid
properties.label: Content Sid

properties.description: Key-value pairs of template variables and their substitution values.
properties.name: ContentVariables

properties.description: The text content of the outgoing message.
properties.name: Body
properties.label: Body

triggers.description: Triggers when a new WhatsApp message is received.
triggers.name: newWhatsappMessage
triggers.title: New WhatsApp Message

properties.description: The Account SID from your Twilio account.
properties.name: username
properties.label: Account SID

properties.description: The Auth Token from your Twilio account.
properties.name: password
properties.label: Auth Token
